mapper.insert: insert into test (test_num, test_date, course_num, session_num) values(#{testNum}, now(), #{courseNum}, #{sessionNum})
INSERT INTO test_questions ( Test_Num, Test_Question_Num, Test_Question_Content, Test_Question_Answer) VALUES (#{testNum}, #{testQuestionNum}, #{testQuestionContent}, #{testQuestionAnswer})
mapper.select: select session_num from test where course_num = #{course_num};

select session_num sessionNum , t.test_num testNum, test_Question_Num testQuestionNum, test_Question_Content testQuestionContent, test_Question_Answer testQuestionAnswer , test_Date testDate, course_Num courseNum from test t right outer join test_questions tq on(t.test_num = tq.test_num) where session_num = #{sessionNum} and course_num = #{courseNum}
